mapper.insert: insert into quan_depth_future (id, exchange_id, base_coin, quote_coin, contract_code, contract_name, depth_ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quoteCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depthTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update quan_depth_future set exchange_id = #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, base_coin = #{baseCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quote_coin = #{quoteCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depth_ts = #{depthTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, base_coin, quote_coin, contract_code, contract_name, depth_ts from quan_depth_future
mapper.insert: insert into quan_depth_future (id, exchange_id, base_coin, quote_coin, contract_code, contract_name, depth_ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quoteCoin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depthTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
